messages.title: Vote Liberal Democrat FOR A BRIGHTER FUTURE
messages.content: Britain needs fresh vision and leadership to restore fairness in our country. The Liberal Democrats will build an economy that works for everyone, not just the richest.

messages.title: Jo Swinson is the Prime Minister we deserve
messages.content: A Liberal Democrat government will build an economy where every single person and community is able to succeed and make sure that we protect our planet for future generations.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Britain needs fresh vision and leadership to restore fairness in our country. The Liberal Democrats will build an economy that works for everyone, not just the richest.
The Liberal Democrats will take the urgent action needed to protect our environment, making Britain a world leader in renewable energy and green technology.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: INVEST IN SCHOOLS AND OUR NHS
keyPolicies.policyDescription: As Prime Minister, Jo Swinson will work every day to ensure our children get to go to the best schools in the world. The Liberal Democrats will invest in schools to ensure the future of the NHS after years of Conservative neglect.

Our teachers and school classes that are every bit as good as any in the world – they just need more government support. We will recruit more teachers and ensure every child has the skills they need to pass exams.

mentions.candidate: Paula Ferguson is leading the way on Brexit and is the only candidate who can beat Boris Johnson's Conservative in Winchester and Chandler’s Ford.

images.caption: Paula Ferguson leading campaign with supporters

examples: Paula Ferguson is leading the way on Brexit and is the only candidate who can beat Boris Johnson's Conservative in Winchester and Chandler’s Ford.
The Liberal Democrats will build an economy that works for everyone, not just the richest.
The Liberal Democrats will build an economy that works for everyone, not just the richest.
The Liberal Democrats will take the urgent action needed to protect our environment, making Britain a world leader in renewable energy and green technology.
The Liberal Democrats will invest in schools to ensure the future of the NHS after years of Conservative neglect.
Both Tories and Labour have failed the country.
British politics is falling apart – the Tories are to blame, but Labour is also a shambles.
Paula Ferguson is leading the way on Brexit and is the only candidate who can beat Boris Johnson's Conservative in Winchester and Chandler’s Ford.
